largenotext.heading: Large hero (Without text)
largenotext.text: Renders a large hero area, without text. Overlay should not be visible.

contentBackgroundColor.heading: With content background color
contentBackgroundColor.text: Renders a hero with a background color for the content area.

contentAlignment.heading: Content alignment
contentAlignment.text: Renders a hero with a content aligned horizontal "center" and vertical "center".

textAlignment.heading: Text alignment
textAlignment.text: Renders a hero with text aligned center.

buttonArgs.heading: Button
buttonArgs.text: Renders a hero with a button.
